mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog( title_image_url, title, brief_introduction, content )VALUE ( #{titleImageUrl}, #{title}, #{briefIntroduction}, #{content} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.auto_id as auto_id, a.title_image_url as title_image_url, a.title as title, a.brief_introduction as brief_introduction, a.content as content, a.author_id as author_id, b.avatar_url as avatar_url, b.nickname as nickname FROM blog a join user b on a.author_id = b.auto_id

SELECT a.title_image_url as title_image_url, a.title as title, a.brief_introduction as brief_introduction, a.content as content, a.created_at as created_at, a.author_id as author_id, b.avatar_url as avatar_url, b.nickname as nickname FROM blog a join user b on a.author_id = b.auto_id where a.auto_id = #{id}
